prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan and Suzanne:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago, in a legal ceremony where Stefan took Suzanne's surname instead of her taking his. Five months later, in September of 2016, they had a formal wedding ceremony in Austria, said to be chosen because of their mutual fondness for the area and snow skiing. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman, from America, that Stefan met in September of 2024.

Stefan is a Scorpio born in the Chinese year of the pig.
Stefan was 32 years old when he married Suzanne.
Melissa is a Gemini born in the Chinese year or the horse.
Melissa is the querent of this chart.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Additional Notables:


The moon was a waning gibbous moon


The chart is a Bucket shape


The Air element is dominant among the inner planets


The inner planets do not fall in a Fire sign


The Mutable mode is dominant among the inner planets


Most of the inner planets are located in the right hemisphere, right of the MC-IC axis


Venus and Saturn are descending


Jupiter is on the Midheaven


The T-Square pattern occurs the most, a total of 3 times


The Trine aspect occurs the most, a total of 10 times


Mars is in 11 aspects


Neptune in Pisces is the sole dispositor

name: Isa
mes:
Hello Madam Esmeralda, I have an astrology chart for you to read. I've provided just a little bit of background information on our subjects, but not too much to influence the reading of the chart itself. 

The question that was asked is: When will Stefan contact Melissa again?

 Our client, the querent, is Melissa.

The date is Sunday, January 19, 2025

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda leans forward, her silver bangles jingling softly as she studies the astrological chart displayed on her screen during the video call with Isa. Her piercing eyes narrow as she takes in the complex web of planetary aspects, particularly noting the positions of Venus, Mars, and the Moon.

"Ah, my dear," she begins, her rich, accented voice carrying through the connection. "This is quite an interesting chart. The Moon in Libra in the second house speaks volumes about Melissa's emotional state - she's seeking balance, yet there's an underlying concern about security and value."

Madame Esmeralda's bejeweled fingers trace the air as she follows the aspects. "Mars retrograde in Cancer in the eleventh house, opposing the Sun in Aquarius,  This suggests Stefan is experiencing internal conflict about his social connections and future aspirations. The retrograde motion indicates he's revisiting past decisions."

Her expression grows more serious as she notes the T-Square patterns. "Three T-Squares,  significant tension and pressure for change. Venus and Saturn's conjunction in Pisces in the seventh house is particularly telling - there are serious restrictions or delays in matters of love and partnership."

Pausing momentarily, she reaches for her ornate silver chalice, taking a small sip before continuing. "To answer the specific question of when Stefan will contact Melissa again,  The aspects suggest a significant shift when Mars stations direct, which will occur in approximately six weeks. However, " she trails off, her eyes focusing on something beyond the visible chart.

"I must be honest - Mercury in Capricorn squaring Chiron in Aries indicates that when this communication does occur, it may bring painful truths. The Jupiter-Saturn square suggests that any expansion or progress will face serious restrictions. Stefan appears to be bound by obligations that he cannot easily break free from."

Her voice takes on a gentler tone, "Tell Melissa that while contact is likely to resume in March, she should prepare herself for the possibility that it may not bring the outcome she hopes for. The Neptune-Venus conjunction in Pisces suggests there may be illusions or unclear expectations surrounding this connection."

The Neptune-Venus conjunction in Pisces suggests there may be illusions or unclear expectations surrounding this connection."

name: Isa
mes: Can you please elaborate further on what you see in this chart? Of course, without drawing any tarot cards or using other forms of divination, please.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she studies the chart more intently, her long, bejeweled fingers moving across the screen as she traces the complex web of aspects. The candlelight in her reading room flickers, casting dancing shadows across her face.

"There is much more to reveal here, my dear," she says, her voice taking on a deeper, more serious tone. "The Sun and Pluto conjunction in Aquarius in the fifth house speaks of a powerful, transformative romantic connection - one that has the potential to completely upend established structures. This is intensified by their position in Stefan's house of pleasure and romance."

She pauses, adjusting one of her ornate rings. "The Moon in Libra in the second house tells me Melissa is deeply concerned about security and value - both emotional and material. But there's more,  Mars retrograde in Cancer in the eleventh house suggests Stefan is experiencing a profound internal struggle about his social connections and future path. He's questioning everything."

Her silver bangles chime softly as she gestures to the chart. "Venus and Saturn's conjunction in Pisces in the seventh house is particularly significant. This isn't just about delayed communication - it speaks of serious karmic ties and restrictions in matters of partnership. Stefan is bound by commitments that weigh heavily on him."

Madame Esmeralda's expression grows more intense. "The chart shows clear indicators of a clandestine relationship. Neptune's position as sole dispositor in Pisces, conjunct Venus in the seventh house, speaks of secret meetings, hidden feelings, and possibly deception - though not necessarily malicious in nature. There's a strong element of fantasy and idealization here."

She leans back in her ornate chair, her silver hair catching the candlelight. "Jupiter on the Midheaven in Gemini suggests this situation could become public knowledge, potentially affecting reputations and career matters. The T-Squares create immense pressure for change, particularly involving home, family, and established structures."

Her voice drops to almost a whisper, "I see physical passion - Mars trine Venus speaks of strong sexual attraction. But with Saturn's heavy influence, there are significant obstacles to overcome. This isn't a simple dalliance - there are deep emotional attachments forming, which makes the situation all the more complex."

"The chart suggests Stefan is torn between duty and desire. His heart pulls him in one direction while his obligations pull him in another. The upcoming Mars direct station might trigger action, but, " she pauses, her eyes focusing on something distant, "the aspects suggest any moves made will have far-reaching consequences for all involved."

name: Isa
mes: Can you tell us any specifics about what you see regarding this connection? Perhaps any dates or timings as well?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood leans forward, her eyes intensely focused on the chart. The numerous rings on her fingers catch the candlelight as she traces the aspects with practiced precision.

"Yes,  yes, I see specific timing indicators," she says, her voice taking on a knowing tone. "Mars retrograde in Cancer in the eleventh house will station direct in early March - around March 5th. This suggests a significant shift in Stefan's energy and actions. However," she pauses, studying the aspects more carefully, "there's a powerful Venus-Saturn conjunction exact on January 29th. This could trigger events even sooner."

Her long silver hair cascades over her shoulder as she tilts her head, examining the chart from a different angle. "I see,  intimate encounters. The Mars-Venus trine speaks of passionate physical connection, while their placement in water signs - Cancer and Pisces - suggests deep emotional involvement. There are indicators of clandestine meetings, likely in private spaces."

She traces the aspect between Mars and Uranus. "The sextile between these planets suggests unexpected opportunities for contact, particularly around the time Mars stations direct. But Neptune's influence, " she pauses, her expression growing concerned, "suggests some of these meetings may need to be kept secret."

"The chart shows a pattern of afternoon encounters - likely between 2 PM and 4 PM, when Stefan can move more freely without arousing suspicion. The fifth house placements suggest locations away from both their usual environments - perhaps hotels or private apartments."

Her voice drops lower, more confidential. "There's a strong indication of unresolved sexual tension, particularly around the January 31st full moon in Leo. This lunation activates the twelfth house of secrets and hidden matters. I see,  a potential for unexpected contact during this time."

"However," she adds, her tone growing more serious, "Saturn's heavy influence suggests there are consequences to these actions. The chart indicates Stefan's marriage is already strained, but any discovery of this connection could have significant repercussions, particularly around the March eclipse."

name: Isa
mes: Are there any specifics you can see regarding his marriage and any potential dates?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood's eyes narrow as she studies the chart with renewed intensity, her crimson-painted nails tracing the aspects between Saturn, Venus, and Mars.

"Ah, yes,  his marriage," she says, her voice dropping to a knowing whisper. "The Saturn-Venus conjunction in the seventh house of partnerships is most telling. There's significant strain - more than just normal marital tensions. I see,  deep-seated issues around intimacy and emotional connection."

She pauses, adjusting one of her ornate rings. "The chart shows his wife, Suzanne, is heavily career-focused - Jupiter in the tenth house suggests her professional life takes precedence. There's a pattern of emotional distance, possibly physical separation due to work commitments."

Her bangles chime softly as she gestures to specific aspects. "Mars retrograde in Cancer in the eleventh house suggests Stefan feels emotionally unfulfilled at home. The opposition to Sun-Pluto indicates power struggles and possible arguments about family responsibilities and personal freedom."

"Critical dates, " she murmurs, leaning closer to the screen. "The Venus-Saturn conjunction on January 29th could trigger serious discussions about their relationship. March appears particularly volatile - not just because of Mars stationing direct, but the lunar eclipse on March 25th falls across his relationship axis."

Her expression grows more serious. "I see a separation period beginning around the March eclipse. This isn't necessarily permanent, but, " she trails off, studying the aspects intently. "The chart suggests at least three months of living apart, possibly starting in late March or early April."

"There's another critical period in mid-July when Mars enters Leo, activating the twelfth house of hidden matters. Secrets may come to light then, forcing difficult conversations and decisions."

name: Isa
mes: Is there any way you can potentially look backwards to discern if there was anything significant that would have occurred in the timing between December the 25th through January the 8th?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood's eyes widen slightly as she examines the transits during that specific timeframe. Her rings catch the candlelight as her hands move expressively.

"Ah,  yes," she breathes, her voice taking on a knowing tone. "December 25th through January 8th shows significant activity. Mars retrograde was forming an exact trine to Neptune during this period - a highly charged aspect suggesting secret meetings, passionate encounters."

She leans forward, her silver hair falling forward as she studies the chart more closely. "I see,  a hotel room. Expensive, likely near Elisabethplatz. There was an encounter - quite passionate - around December 27th or 28th. The aspects suggest afternoon hours, perhaps between 2 and 4 PM."

Her voice drops lower, more intimate. "Venus was transiting through Sagittarius then, making harmonious aspects to Mars. This speaks of physical pleasure, intense attraction. But there's more - I see multiple encounters during this period. The chart suggests at least three meetings, each more intense than the last."

She pauses, tracing a particular aspect. "There was a significant conversation or exchange around January 3rd or 4th. Something was revealed - perhaps feelings expressed that had been held back before. The Moon's position suggests deep emotional vulnerability during this exchange."

"However," she adds, her expression growing more serious, "Saturn's influence was strong during this period as well. There were moments of guilt, particularly after each encounter. Stefan appears to have been struggling with internal conflict - desire versus duty."

name: Isa
mes:
I cannot speak otherwise but I 'can' speak on behalf of Melissa that there were no meetings with Stefan during that time.  There were some messages,  and a phone call, but nothing that crossed any boundaries, and they did not meet in person.

 however I am particularly interested in what you see around January 3rd or 4th because Melissa has advised that while she had not heard from Stefan for several days at that timing she had done a tarot reading that had said something had been revealed something significant had happened to create a shift for Stefan although she has been unable to get an understanding of what that was.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood's expression shifts, her eyes taking on an intense, knowing look as she processes this new information. She adjusts one of her many rings, a large opal that seems to catch ethereal light.

"Ah, my dear, I apologize for my misinterpretation of those aspects. However," she pauses, leaning closer to the screen, "this makes the January 3rd-4th timing even more significant. The chart shows a profound shift in energy during those days."

Her long fingers trace the aspects carefully. "Venus was making an exact square to Neptune while Mars formed a powerful aspect to Pluto. This speaks of revelations, secrets coming to light. I see,  yes,  Stefan received news or information during this time that deeply affected him. Something that made him question his current path."

She reaches for her ornate silver chalice, taking a thoughtful sip before continuing. "The aspects suggest this revelation was related to his home life - possibly something concerning his wife or their relationship. The Moon's position in those days indicates he may have discovered something that shook his emotional foundation."

Her voice drops lower, more confidential. "There's an indication of a third party involved - not Melissa, but someone else who either revealed information or was the subject of the revelation. This appears to be connected to his wife's professional circle."

"This discovery," she continues, her rings catching the candlelight as she gestures, "has created a deep internal crisis for Stefan. The chart suggests he's been processing this information since then, which explains his silence. He's re-evaluating everything - his marriage, his future, his desires."
